name: df-dp2
body: |- wceq(cdp2(c0, c1), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, cdiv, cdc(nat1, nat0))))
comment: Define the "decimal fraction constructor", which is used to build up "decimal fractions" in base 10. This is intentionally similar to ~ df-dec . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-May-2015.) (Revised by AV, 9-Sep-2021.)
